tweets.author_name: Amy celebrates Wrinkle in Time instead of XMas
tweets.html:
It is fucking crazy to realize that the people in the #bb14 house don't realize how many ways the GOP has fucked up since July started.

If you don't even have a network television crime drama understanding of the human body, you shouldn't be allowed to hold office.

"This is, in fact, a Legitimate Rape."-- Worst "Antiques Roadshow" Ever #akin

Law & Order: SVLR #SpecialVictimsLegitimateRape #WhosTheRealVictim #StillTheAudience

The doctor Todd Akin learned about babies from was actually two of the Little Rascals wearing a giant lab coat.
